name: Roraima Group of Companies – Roraima Airways
tag_list: caribbean-vacation, tropical-vacation, guyana-vacation, eco-lodge, family-vacation, vacation-package, adventure, adventure-travel, eco-tourism, eco-tours-
overview:
Roraima Airways was established in November 1992 commencing its operations as a domestic airline doing charters in Guyana, South America, and the Caribbean with particular emphasis on executive clientele. Over the years, the company has expanded its range of services into ten divisions all of them connected with vertical integration and cross fertilizing synergies operating in support of the mining, logging and tourism industries specifically and Guyana’s National Development generally. The co-founders of Roraima Airways are Captain Gerald and Debbie Gouveia both of whom are experienced professional airline transport rated pilots. Captain Debbie Gouveia is a graduate of Flight Safety Academy in Vero Beach Florida. While Captain Gerald Gouveia graduated from the Embry Riddle Aeronautical University. He continued his education at the George Washington University in Virginia and the National Defense University in DC.

The divisions of the company are as follows:

Air charters- passengers/ cargo Roraima International Travel Agency -An IATA Accredited Travel Agency for your International Ticketing Needs Duke Lodge Hotel – Restaurant & Bar Residence Inn- Restaurant & Bar Arrowpoint Nature Resort- perfect for Corporate retreats, family get away, Wedding and Honeymoon packages, Birdwatching, Mountain Biking Roraima Tours- Itinerary Planning & Guyana Adventure packages Airline Handling Services- Check – In / ramp services Airline Aviation Security Services Roraima Executive & First class Lounge Roraima Crew resting Lounge Roraima Air Medical Evacuation Services- Domestic / International
